Text: electionwere you all up all night We were up until and then got up again at stayed up until and then went back to bed This better turn out the right way Mom and your little brother
Congratulationsto goBen You are the best Im so glad you finished and finished wellYou should be very proud of yourselfI am Love you lots Mom and Dale and Casey
Happy BirthdayBen Hope you have a very happy birthday We love you Mom Dale and Casey

Ben Its about and I just talked to Kara a while ago Shes trying to figure out how her life is going to go starting next week when shes finished with the outpatient program Were trying to help her and MAs trying too Theres a lot to work outThis has been a real wakeup call Hope al is OK at your end Ill give you a call Mom

Ben Its your Ma We just got back from a nice dinner in Boston It was good to get out Were going over to the Vineyard for the weekend if youre looking for us Do you have Monday off Kara is home now You might want to give her a call I think shes glad to be home but she has a lot to go through before shes in good shape Have a good weekend Love ya Mom

Ben You must be working too hard if youre thinking of going on vacation with the old folks Sounds great to me though Its funny Dale and I had been thinking along the same lines Great minds Hope youre not working late tonight Love ya M

Ben I just saw your message from I guess Im one of those who is lazy about checking emails or just not used to it It has been busy around here The SNCARC dinner was a success but Im glad it is over now Kara seems to be doing a bit better I was there today and we went out for a walk It was good I think she has a ways to go though Im glad to hear that you are going to be staying in Houston Id like to hear more about how that all went Well Id better get dinner started Hope you had a good weekend Love ya
Ben I feel much better now Sorry youre working such long hours Love ya Mom
Ben I emailed you Now youre supposed to email me back Im waiting Love CyberMom
morning Ben Just wanted to say HI Hope you had a great weekend Love ya CyberMom
